description:
The global target setting is two fold. 

Global Targets is the amount of money that a Tuktuk Driver is supposed to generate a day. Driver's who meet this target within the global operating hours, receive 100% of the customer payment. Target's not met during globel operating hours roll over to the next day. Three consecutive days of target misses results in the driver being terminated.
name: Set Global Targets
title: Set Global Targets
